name: HSP_ACCT_ADDL_DX
description: Additional diagnoses for reporting associated with this hospital account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account with associated additional diagnoses for reporting.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_RPT_DX_ID
columns.description: This column stores additional diagnosis codes that may be documented on the hospital account but not in the typical item because they are not valid for billing.
